data.eml:eml: Generic synopsis of the Formicidae of Vietnam (Insecta: Hymenoptera), Part I - Myrmicinae and Pseudomyrmicinae.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eguchi, K., Viet, B. T., Yamane, S. (2011): Generic synopsis of the Formicidae of Vietnam (Insecta: Hymenoptera), Part I - Myrmicinae and Pseudomyrmicinae. Zootaxa 2878: 1-61, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/23462/23462.pdf
